extensionDescription.message: 通过鼠标手势扩展，用户可以完成基本的Microsoft Edge浏览器操作。例如按住鼠标右键画一个“L”就可以关闭当前Tab页, 或者移动鼠标从右到左画一条直线就可以返回到之前的页面。用户可以自定义鼠标手势。

browserActionTitle.description: The text when mouse hover on extension icon

optionsPageHeadTitle.description: The header title for options page

optionsPageTitle.description: The title for Mouse Gesture options page

settingTabTitle.description: The title for Mouse Gesture setting page

settingTabEnableMouseGestureCheckbox.description: The name of enable mouse gestures setting entry

settingTabEnablePenGestureCheckbox.description: The name of enable pen gestures setting entry

settingTabGesturesTips.message: 在浏览窗口中按住鼠标右键滑出一个轨迹即可使用鼠标手势

resetConfirmModalTitle.message: 你确定要重置为默认设置吗？

resetConfirmModalConfirmButton.description: The content for reset confirm modal confirm button

actionOpenLinkInNewTab.description: The open link in new tab action
actionOpenLinkInNewTab.message: 在新标签页中打开此链接

actionCloseAllTabsExceptCurrent.description: The close all tabs except current action
actionCloseAllTabsExceptCurrent.message: 关闭除当前页之外的所有标签页

enableSendTelemetryCheckboxLabel.description: Text of the checkbox of sending telemetry data
enableSendTelemetryCheckboxLabel.message: 发送数据到微软以帮助我们改进本扩展

sendTelemetryDescription.message: 匿名数据将发送给微软，包括您如何使用鼠标手势和如何进行设置。我们不会收集与用户身份相关的信息。

feedbackKindTitle.message: 感谢您提供反馈，您的反馈类型是?

feedbackTabFeedbackCommentTextAreaPlaceh.description: Initial text inside the feedback text box
feedbackTabFeedbackCommentTextAreaPlaceh.message: 请在此输入您的反馈。 （请不要输入个人信息例如邮件地址，电话号码等。）

includeEmailCheckboxLabel.description: The content for include email checkbox label

successSendFeedbackModalTitle.description: Content for sending feedback success state

failSendFeedbackModalTitle.description: Content for sending feedback failed state
failSendFeedbackModalTitle.message: 很抱歉我们现在无法发送反馈，请稍后再试。

changeLog_0_1_16_10501_Line0.description: The content for change log line1 for version 0.1.16.10501

changeLog_0_1_16_10501_Line1.message: 支持通过拖拽打开链接

resetSettingAlertText.description: The text for default setting restore
resetSettingAlertText.message: 恢复默认鼠标手势成功

upgradeConfirmModalContentLine1.description: Content line 1 for upgrade confirm dialog content
upgradeConfirmModalContentLine1.message: 鼠标手势有新版本，请尽快升级到最新版本。

upgradeConfirmModalContentLine2.description: Content line 2 for upgrade confirm dialog content

upgradeConfirmModalContentLine3.description: Content line 3 for upgrade confirm dialog content
upgradeConfirmModalContentLine3.message: 1.点击“确定”按钮到扩展的selfhost页面，下载最新的鼠标手势

upgradeConfirmModalContentLine4.description: Content line 4 for upgrade confirm dialog content
upgradeConfirmModalContentLine4.message: 2.移除当前版本，然后安装最新版本的鼠标手势

upgradeConfirmModalConfirmButton.description: The content for upgrade confirm modal confirm button

ftuPageTitle.description: The title for first time use page

ftuPageRestartTip.description: The content for restart tip in first time use page
ftuPageRestartTip.message: 提示：为确保鼠标手势的正常使用，安装后你需要重启Microsoft Edge。

ftuPageSlide1Content.description: The content for slide1 of first time use page
ftuPageSlide1Content.message: Microsoft Edge鼠标手势，按住鼠标右键滑出轨迹，完成基本的浏览器操作。
